website_summaries.verdict: Add a touch of country flair to any home with this aesthetically pleasing vase.
pros: Removable metal lid has holes to keep flowers from drooping over the edges
Vase and stand available in multiple sizes
Adequate opening allows for easy cleaning
cons: Glass jar wobbles slightly inside the metal stand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected! Here's a pepper shaker to give everyone a grasp on the size.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very well made, exactly what we were looking for and shipped quickly even during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Vase With Country Charm
customer_reviews.text: These give a dash of country charm to any space. The top has holes so flowers stay arranged neatly spaced apart. There are other's that are smaller...this one is large enough for roses. The opening is large enough to easily fit your hand inside for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I wanted it for. The frog on top is great to make arranging the stems easy. Tulips were also bought on Amazon and are gorgeous too.
customer_reviews.author: JennK

customer_reviews.title: even nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large vase. It's even nicer than I expected. Substantial and well made. Great look for farmhouse, country, french country decor. I filled it with realistic faux white tulips and it looks beautiful. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: noyb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, and looks nice, but flowers don't easily fit in the cap. I'm very disappointed, I bought two sizes for our house and haven't been able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, and looks nice, but flowers don't easily fit in the cap. I'm very disappointed, I bought two sizes for our house and haven't been able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty vase that I purchased to use on my kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty vase that I purchased to use on my kitchen hutch for decor. I love the antique look to these vases due largely to the metal holders, although unfortunately, the glass does not sit completely straight in the metal stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lady from New England

customer_reviews.title: Looks antique - but isn't
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a decoration (although will probably use it as a vase at times). It looks like something you'd find in an antique store, so it fits the theme of my room. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, I have more fresh cut flowers in my home now. I thought I was going to use them as gifts, but I don’t want to part with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Jones

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and charming for a country kitchen. My daughter loves picking flowers in the garden to add to it. Perfect for her to bring me those precious gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far a premium product!! It's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far a premium product!! It's the prettiest flower vase I've ever had. I definitely will buy again. I got the large vase and plan on buying the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette S.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and was very pleased. Item is larger than expected and quite substantial. Perfect gift for the flower gardener in your life!
customer_reviews.author: J. Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Display Flowers
customer_reviews.text: Very cute in my dinning room, a bit smaller than expected but lucky me..... it comes in a larger size too.
customer_reviews.author: D-L-W~NW

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful! Yes
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful! Yes, like a few others commented, it is a little smaller - I did pull out the ruler, but I think it will work out wonderfully with flowers in it. It's just as the image shows. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Thankful

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but bigger than I expected. It didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but bigger than I expected. It didn't work for the area I bought it for because of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lynn

customer_reviews.title: makes arrangements easy to make.
customer_reviews.text: The style is just right for a rustic setting. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: thoughtful

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for the frog lid to hold flowers in place. The package arrived without the frog lid. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: James E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Glass and metal flower vase
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, and a nice size for long stemmed flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Top was pretty scratched but I can live with it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute vase. Top was pretty scratched but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Viper860

customer_reviews.title: Nice but extremly big.
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than I expected. The description said 10.5" I just assumed that included the flowers pictured. Nope. Flowers sold separately, but this thing is huge. I'm really debating on sending it back because I just have no use for something so big. Edited to add - I have a rustic theme throughout my house, so I just removed the top and used it as my cooking utensil holder. Works out perfect and looks so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking for thin stemmed flowers
customer_reviews.text: I saw this base at a friend's house and really like the look of it. The only downside is if you buy stemmed flowers that have a larger knob on them instead of just a thin stem they do not fit through the holes on the top of the vase.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gardeners
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these vases myself, and loved it so much, I have given one to all my friends. It is perfect when you only have a bloom or two. Because of the frog top, you don't have one sad droopy flower, you have one happy stand up flower to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: book worm

customer_reviews.title: Good vase
customer_reviews.text: Love this vase . It's attractive, sturdy, and the topper helps hold fake or real flowers in place nicely. There shape is also unique.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Baker

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice but smaller than I expected but that is my fault for not getting out my ruler. I really like this type of lid on vases since it keeps each flower in it's place!
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: These vases were the perfect gift. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These vases were the perfect gift. Just what I was looking for. The glass was not thin. I was thick and heavy and I had hoped. Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: MPerry

customer_reviews.title: Metal lid flower vase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vase,gave a set for a house warming gift
customer_reviews.author: K.E. Shing

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vase! Love it! I get so many compliments from everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

product_meta.title: Creative Co-Op DE3875 Glass vase in Metal Stand with Metal Frog Lid
product_meta.description: Size:LargeThe vase plays a large part in the beauty of a flower arrangement. This vase can be used with individual flowers placed through each hole in the lid or a grouping of flowers with the lid removed. The metal framed holder with wood handles adds an extra touch of flare its overall appearance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
